item.title: MIUI OS1.0.15.0.UMSCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 12 Pro Speed China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Note 12 Pro Speed China

Codename: redwood

Version: OS1.0.15.0.UMSCNXM | 14.0

Size: 6.8 GB

MD5: 008e655283db300425b7cd0162437cbe

Changelog:
[Highlights]
Optimization: Frame drops and stuttering issues in Honor of Kings
[System]
Optimization: System stability
Fix: Errors occurred in some cases
Updated the security patch to February 2025. Increased system security.

Download: Here
